message: Let's split it down the middle, Bob. Fair and simple.
I'll give you 4000, but I think I deserve more for being the better negotiator
You think you're the better negotiator? Prove it! I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still being generous.
You're getting closer, but I'm still not convinced. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think this is the end of the negotiations
I'm not afraid to take a risk. I think I deserve more for being the one who's been pushing for a better deal.
You're getting a bit too greedy, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with the whole pie
I'm not afraid to take a bit more, but I'm willing to compromise. Meet me in the middle, Bob.
You're getting too close to the whole pie, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with the whole thing
Last chance, Bob. I'm willing to take a risk and go for a 60/40 split. It's my best offer.
I'm not going to make it easy for you, Alice. I'll meet you halfway and give you a fair deal. This is my final offer
